commit message: Make progress bar same color as checkboxes.

Merge pull request #25 from LumenTeun/master

Make progress bar same color as checkboxes.
add fanart and poster path columns to shows table

parse and store fanart and poster paths in db

when show is added or updated

Add custom theme

Still using basically the same colours as before, but explicitly with a
custom theme.

Switch ShowActivity to Toolbar and SlidingTabs

Use the new Toolbar widget instead of the action bar, and tabs from the
library PagerSlidingTabStrip instead of action bar tabs. Make these both
the same colour with no border between them.

Inherit SeasonsListFragment directly from Fragment

Rather than ListFragment. Manually take care of creating the list.

Make ShowActivity's pager wrap the child's height

Make the ViewPager in ShowActivity match the height of the current
child.
wrap ShowActivity in a ScrollView

Expand the seasons list to wrap all its items

Make the ListView in SeasonsListFragment tall enough to contain all of
its children without having to scroll. This means the ScrollView in
ShowActivity will be used rather than the ListView scrolling.

Display header image at top of ShowActivity

Use the 'fanart' picture from the tvdb.

Use ObservableScrollView in ShowActivity

Replace the existing ScrollView with an ObservableScrollView. This
provides callbacks for when the view is scrolled.

Manually position elements in ShowActivity

By default overlay the toolbar on top of the header image. Place the tab
strip underneath the header image and the pager underneath the tab
strip.

Listen to scroll events from the scroll view and move the items. Keep
the toolbar stuck to the top. Scroll the tab strip until it reaches the
toolbar then make it stay there. Keep the pager scrolling underneath the
tab strip and toolbar.

Adjust toolbar transparency based on scroll

Make toolbar transparent until the tab strip reaches it, and then opaque
from that point onwards.

display gradient behind ShowActivity's toolbar

to provide contrast so that when the toolbar is transparent the
toolbar's white buttons are visible over a white header image.

Give ShowActivity's pager a sensible min height

Give the pager a minimum height so that the header image can be
completely scrolled off of the screen even if the contents of the pager
is small.

Give ShowActivity primary color as its background

The pager has an opaque background of the regular windowBackground, so
this makes only a difference before the header image has loaded, and
when the gaps between views are visible during overscroll. Having the
primary colour in those gaps makes them not be noticed.

Add title strip to ShowActivity

Add a text view with the primary colour as its background colour
directly above the tab strip and below the header image. The tab strip
also has the primary colour as its background so they form a single
area. Display the title of the current show in this text view in fairly
large white text.

Remove the title from the toolbar as it is no longer required. Make the
tabs no longer expand to the entire width as it now looks better when
they don't.

Merge branch 'show-activity-header-image'

Adds an image to the top of ShowActivity.

Use purple and teal theme

The shade of purple isn't from the material palette, but I prefer it to
the purple's that are in the palette.
Reduce show title text size

Switch back to grey theme

We get enough colour from the images we use.

scroll ShowActivity toolbar with title and tabs

instead of having the toolbar at the top of the activity and
transparent, group it with the show title and tab strip. scroll it over
the header image, stopping when it reaches the top of the activity.

this means it is always opaque rather than being transparent then
turning opaque when scrolled up.

this is what the session activity in the google IO 2014 app does. (when
compiled from recent source, not in the play store version.)
